parameters.name: Cpu
parameters.description: The information about the CPU resources of the tenant.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: LogDisk
parameters.description: The size of the log disk allocated to the tenant, in GB.

parameters.name: Memory
parameters.description: The memory size of the tenant, in GB.

parameters.name: ReadOnlyZoneList
parameters.description: Specifies to create a read-only zone. Separate the names of multiple zones with commas (,).
